name: Embrochette
author: Dave Sandel
summary: This is a recipe that has been enjoyed by my family for many years. The combination of shrimp and oysters mixed with the flavor of bacon is unique and unforgettable.
ingredients: 1 pound extra large shrimp (16-20), peeled and deveined
directions: Tuck 1 oyster into the curve of a shrimp; wrap half a bacon slice around both
Place on a metal skewer, making sure to run the skewer through the oyster to keep it from sliding out during cooking
Repeat with remaining shrimp, oysters, and bacon slices
Preheat a gas or wood grill for medium heat
Spray grate lightly with cooking spray
Cook skewers, flipping at least twice, until bacon is almost crispy, about 20 minutes
